values: To clap means to hit one’s hands together to express pleasure or get attention.
After the speech, everyone in the crowd clapped their hands for the speaker.
n. 鼓掌；拍手声 vt. 拍手，鼓掌；轻轻拍打某人 vi. 鼓掌，拍手；啪地关上
